titleStmt.title: A history of antient ceremonies containing an account of their rise and growth, their first entrance into the Church, and their gradual advancement to superstition therein.
titleStmt.author: Porrée, Jonas.
Douglas, Thomas, fl. 1661.
Wilson, John, fl. 1676-1678.

notesStmt.note: "Written originally in French, but now for general information and benefit, faithfully translated into English."
"Translators note to the reader" signed: Tho. Douglas.
Attributed by Wing to John Wilson.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
